sentences.cn: 他是个自高自大的笨蛋!

sentences.en: Little Twit blasted me on his new cd, why?
sentences.cn: 他在新专辑中攻击我?为什么?

sentences.en: Mr. Tongue Twister tried to teach tongue to twist and turn, and twit an twat.
sentences.cn: 汤·迪斯先生努力教你舌头怎样去“扭”去“翻”去“转”去“挖苦”那些舌头笨拙的人.

sentences.en: Mr. Tongue Twister tried to teach your tongue to twist and turn, and twit an twat.
sentences.cn: 汤迪斯特先生努力教你的舌头怎样去“扭”去“翻”去“转”去“挖苦”那些舌头笨拙的人.

sentences.en: Stop messing around, you silly twit!
sentences.cn: 别胡闹了, 你这个蠢货!

trans.tran_en: to tease, taunt, or reproach, often in jest
